track.strDescriptionEN:
"Flava in Ya Ear" is a single by Craig Mack. The original single was released first and the remix followed soon after. It featured performances by labelmate The Notorious B.I.G. (the only time they collaborated while he was alive), Rampage, LL Cool J and Busta Rhymes. It also contains Puff Daddy as a promoter and brief appearances by Keisha Epps and Mary J. Blige. The video features guest appearances by Das EFX, Mic Geronimo, and Irv Gotti though none perform on the song. The original song is widely regarded as a classic rap song.

During an interview, The Notorious B.I.G. was asked whether Craig Mack would appear on any tracks for Ready to Die. Biggie responded simply by saying: "Na, I don't fuck with that dude." 

The song appeared on Bad Boy's 10th Anniversary... The Hits album. The single itself peaked at #9 on the Billboard Hot 100.

The remix version of the song appears in the video game Dance Central for the Xbox 360.
